decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (0.01, A 1.00, A 4.00, Design and access statement prepared by Omnide Ltd (dated 21 March 2016). Received on 11 February 2016. Arboriculture report prepared by Omnide Ltd (dated 21 March 2016), Heritage Assessment prepared by Planning Sense (dated March 2016). Received on 24 March 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good, shall match the original work in both type, colour and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution.
description: Demolition of 22 linear metres x 2m high wall and erection of a new wall
